an5.198:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, no dubbhasita, anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunam.
an5.198:1.3: Kalena ca bhasita hoti, sacca ca bhasita hoti, sanha ca bhasita hoti, atthasamhita ca bhasita hoti, mettacittena ca bhasita hoti.
an5.198:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagata vaca subhasita hoti, no dubbhasita, anavajja ca ananuvajja ca vinnunan”ti.
